This game is so much fun and competitive. There is a reason that this game is still thriving and it is it's gameplay. It's Free to play now and the only way you can truely understand why it's so popular is to give it a try.

Super fun game especially with friends, but also very tilting :') Recommended for anyone that enjoys FPS games and competitive play!

Still one, if not, the best competitive FPS out there. Played casually since Beta 5.0 through 7.1 and spent a lot of hours with CS:Source. CS:GO is just more polished and "balanced". Just play it! (preferably with friends because as with other games, the skill gap from veteran players will leave you frustrated because you will die very quickly without knowing what's going on) It will take a while to learn the weapons but kills will always be satisfying.

I'll always recommend this game as a superior competitive FPS over the new mainstream ones.

IF you play this game for fun then go ahead. But if you play on competitve you'll just get kicked by a bunch a stupid faggouts trying to troll. You'll just get banned for 7 days constantly and consistently
